name: 7th International Conference on Signal, Image Processing
content: 7th International Conference on Signal, Image Processing (SIPO 2023) January 02 \~ 03, 2023, Zurich, Switzerland https://aisca2023.org/sipo/index SCOPE 7th International Conference on Signal, Image Processing (SIPO 2023) is a forum for presenting new advances and research results in the fields of Signal and Image Processing. The conference will bring together leading researchers, engineers and scientists in the domain of interest from around the world. Authors are solicited to contribute to this conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to. TOPICS OF INTEREST • 3D and Stereo Imaging • 3-D and Surface Reconstruction • Analog and Mixed Signal Processing • Application & Others • Applications (Biomedical, Bioinformatics, Genomic, Seismic, Radar, Sonar, Remote Sensing, Positioning, etc.) • Array Signal Processing • Audio/Speech Processing and Coding • Biomedical Imaging Technologies • Biometrics and Pattern Recognition • Cognitive and Biologically-Inspired Vision • Color and Texture • Communication Signal processing • Computer Communication and Networks • Computer Vision & VR • Constraint Processing • Content-Based Image Retrieval • Data Mining Techniques • Detection and Estimation of Signal Parameters • Digital & Mobile Signal Processing • Distributed Source Coding • Document Recognition • Image Processing & Understanding • Image Segmentation • Image-Based Modeling • Internet Signal Processing • Knowledge Representation and High-Level Vision • Medical Image Analysis • Motion and Tracking Stereo and Structure from Motion • Motion Detection • Multidimensional Signal Processing • Multiple Filtering and Filter Banks • Multi-View Geometry • Neural Networks and Genetic Algorithms • Nonlinear Signals and Systems • Object Detection, Recognition and Categorization • Others • Pattern Recognition and Analysis • DSP Implementation and Embedded Systems • Face and Gesture • Face Recognition & Super-Resolution Imaging • Filter Design and Structures • FIR, IIR, Adaptive Filters • Sensor Array and Multi-Channel Processing • Shape Representation • Signal Identification • Signal Noise Control • Signal Processing Education • Statistic Learning & Pattern Recognition • Text Processing • Time-Frequency Signal Analysis • Video Signal Processing • Video Surveillance and Monitoring • Visualization • Hardware Implementation for Signal Processing • Higher Order Spectral Analysis • Illumination and Reflectance Modeling • Image Acquisition & Medical Image Processing • Image and Video Retrieval • Image Coding and Compression • Pattern Recognition in New Modalities • PDE for Image Processing • Performance Evaluation • Radar Signal Processing • Remote Sensing • Signal Reconstruction • Sonar Signal Processing and Localization • Spectral Analysis • Speech, Audio and Music Processing • Statistical & Optical Signal Processing • Time-Frequency/Time-Scale Analysis • Video Analysis and Event Recognition • Video Compression & Streaming • Watermarking Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by December 17, 2022 (Final Call ) . Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from SIPO 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • Signal & Image Processing: An International Journal (SIPIJ) – WJCI Indexed • International Journal of Multimedia & Its Applications (IJMA) – ERA Indexed, WJCI Indexed • International Journal of VLSI design & Communication Systems (VLSICS) • International Journal of Embedded Systems and Applications (IJESA) Important Dates • Submission Deadline : December 17, 2022 ( final call ) • Authors Notification : December 27, 2022 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : December 29, 2022 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : sipo@aisca2023.org or sipoconf@yahoo.com For other details : https://aisca2023.org/sipo/index Paper Submission Link : https://aisca2023.org/submission/index.php
